title: East Ville des Folies
seo_description: Head to historic Webster Hall for an evening of beer and whiskey at the fourth annual East Ville des Folies.
preview: Head to historic Webster Hall for an evening of beer and whiskey at the fourth annual East Ville des Folies.
contents:
Head to historic Webster Hall for an evening of beer and whiskey at the fourth annual East Ville des Folies. For three hours, ticketholders will have open access to four floors of beer and whiskey samplings, accompanied by burlesque dancing, swing jazz bands, trepeze artists and circus acts. Reputedly owned by Al Capone in the 1920s, Webster Hall flagrantly ignoring Prohibition and became one of NYCâ€™s favorite nightclubs. East Ville des Folies brings some of the 1920s mystique into the 21st century.


For more information and tickets ($50), visit the event website.
